Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent; local myMouse = nil
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") if myMouse ~= nil then myMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") if myMouse ~= nil then myMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
myMouse = mouse
if Tool.Enabled then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

-- 41410287 - crunch -- 41410408 - mmm1 -- 41410429 - mmm2 -- (phone sounds): -- 41440521 - click -- 41440567 - beep -- 41440601 - startupSound
-- 41450987 - latkeCake -- 41451052 - latkePlate
local Tool = script.Parent
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent humanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end if vCharacter.Name == "BackPack" then Tool.Enabled = true return end
local startVect = Vector3.new(-0.7, 0.05, 0) local endVect = Vector3.new(-1.5, -0.7, -.7) Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41450987" for i = 1, 20 do Tool.GripPos = (startVect*(20-i) + endVect*(i))/20 wait(.05) end
crunchSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("CrunchSound") if crunchSound == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end crunchSound:Play()
wait(1)
-- play sound magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end magicSound:Play()
selector = math.random(0,1) if selector == 0 then magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41410408" -- mmm1 else magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41410429" -- mmm2 end
-- rest of script Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0.7, 0.05, 0)
wait(2)
Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41385697"
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41385697" end magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 selector = math.random(0,1) if selector == 0 then magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41410408" -- mmm1 else magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41410429" -- mmm2 end magicSound.Name = "MagicSound" end
crunchSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("CrunchSound") if crunchSound == nil then crunchSound = Instance.new("Sound") crunchSound.Volume = 1 crunchSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=41410287" crunchSound.Name = "CrunchSound" crunchSound.Parent = Tool.Handle end end
function onUnequipped() magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound ~= nil then magicSound:Stop() magicSound.Parent = nil end
crunchSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("CrunchSound") if crunchSound ~= nil then crunchSound:Stop() crunchSound.Parent = nil end
Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0.7, 0.05, 0) end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
